author: nacho
msg: Bug#12998 HTTPS gets changed to HTTP://servername:443
The processor (HTTP11 or ajp13) should set the scheme and port prior
to this point, in an ajp13 connection doesnt make sense to get the secure
flag from the connector secure flag.

author: nacho
msg: Reverted a prior fix, it seems that hangs w2k IIS, it's starts to stuck threads in this loop until exhausted or max connections reached..
